StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetCollegePro.leExtended]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@SchoolCode as integer
AS SET NOCOUNT ON BEGIN SELECT -- CollegePro.leExtID is an iden.ty .eld and should not be selected [CollegePro.leExtID] As CollegePro.leID, cp.[SCHOOL_CODE] AS SchoolCode, cpe.[FiscalYear], hs.highschool_name AS CollegeName, [NumVisits], [NumMCFOPS],[NumEAC],[NumPresenta.ons], [NumMailOutConducted],[PercentMailOutReturn],[NumPosterityConducted], [PercentPosterityReturn],[NumContracts],[NumCommissions], --need to .x AEV column name in the table [NumAEV]
FROM [MCRISS].[USMC].[CollegePro.leExtended] cpe INNER JOIN [USMC].CollegePro.le cp ON cpe.CollegePro.leExtID = cp.CollegePro.leID INNER JOIN [dbo].High_School hs ON cp.school_code = hs.school_code and hs.school_type <> 'HS'
WHERE cp.SCHOOL_CODE = @SchoolCode ORDER by FiscalYear END
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
